Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/bind.keys.h

1/* $NetBSD: bind.keys.h,v 1.4 2019/04/28 00:01:13 christos Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef BIND_KEYS_H
4#define BIND_KEYS_H 1
5#define TRUSTED_KEYS "\
6# The bind.keys file is used to override the built-in DNSSEC trust anchors\n\
7# which are included as part of BIND 9. The only trust anchors it contains\n\
8# are for the DNS root zone (\".\"). Trust anchors for any other zones MUST\n\
9# be configured elsewhere; if they are configured here, they will not be\n\
10# recognized or used by named.\n\
11#\n\
12# To use the built-in root key, set \"dnssec-validation auto;\" in the\n\
13# named.conf options, or else leave \"dnssec-validation\" unset. If\n\
14# \"dnssec-validation\" is set to \"yes\", then the keys in this file are\n\
15# ignored; keys will need to be explicitly configured in named.conf for\n\
16# validation to work. \"auto\" is the default setting, unless named is\n\
17# built with \"configure --disable-auto-validation\", in which case the\n\
18# default is \"yes\".\n\
19#\n\
20# This file is NOT expected to be user-configured.\n\
21#\n\
22# Servers being set up for the first time can use the contents of this file\n\
23# as initializing keys; thereafter, the keys in the managed key database\n\
24# will be trusted and maintained automatically.\n\
25#\n\
26# These keys are current as of Mar 2019. If any key fails to initialize\n\
27# correctly, it may have expired. In that event you should replace this\n\
28# file with a current version. The latest version of bind.keys can always\n\
29# be obtained from ISC at https://www.isc.org/bind-keys.\n\
30#\n\
31# See https://data.iana.org/root-anchors/root-anchors.xml for current trust\n\
32# anchor information for the root zone.\n\
33\n\
34trusted-keys {\n\
35 # This key (20326) was published in the root zone in 2017.\n\
36 . 257 3 8 \"AwEAAaz/tAm8yTn4Mfeh5eyI96WSVexTBAvkMgJzkKTOiW1vkIbzxeF3\n\
37 +/4RgWOq7HrxRixHlFlExOLAJr5emLvN7SWXgnLh4+B5xQlNVz8Og8kv\n\
38 ArMtNROxVQuCaSnIDdD5LKyWbRd2n9WGe2R8PzgCmr3EgVLrjyBxWezF\n\
39 0jLHwVN8efS3rCj/EWgvIWgb9tarpVUDK/b58Da+sqqls3eNbuv7pr+e\n\
40 oZG+SrDK6nWeL3c6H5Apxz7LjVc1uTIdsIXxuOLYA4/ilBmSVIzuDWfd\n\
41 RUfhHdY6+cn8HFRm+2hM8AnXGXws9555KrUB5qihylGa8subX2Nn6UwN\n\
42 R1AkUTV74bU=\";\n\
43};\n\
44"
45
46#define MANAGED_KEYS "\
47# The bind.keys file is used to override the built-in DNSSEC trust anchors\n\
48# which are included as part of BIND 9. The only trust anchors it contains\n\
49# are for the DNS root zone (\".\"). Trust anchors for any other zones MUST\n\
50# be configured elsewhere; if they are configured here, they will not be\n\
51# recognized or used by named.\n\
52#\n\
53# To use the built-in root key, set \"dnssec-validation auto;\" in the\n\
54# named.conf options, or else leave \"dnssec-validation\" unset. If\n\
55# \"dnssec-validation\" is set to \"yes\", then the keys in this file are\n\
56# ignored; keys will need to be explicitly configured in named.conf for\n\
57# validation to work. \"auto\" is the default setting, unless named is\n\
58# built with \"configure --disable-auto-validation\", in which case the\n\
59# default is \"yes\".\n\
60#\n\
61# This file is NOT expected to be user-configured.\n\
62#\n\
63# Servers being set up for the first time can use the contents of this file\n\
64# as initializing keys; thereafter, the keys in the managed key database\n\
65# will be trusted and maintained automatically.\n\
66#\n\
67# These keys are current as of Mar 2019. If any key fails to initialize\n\
68# correctly, it may have expired. In that event you should replace this\n\
69# file with a current version. The latest version of bind.keys can always\n\
70# be obtained from ISC at https://www.isc.org/bind-keys.\n\
71#\n\
72# See https://data.iana.org/root-anchors/root-anchors.xml for current trust\n\
73# anchor information for the root zone.\n\
74\n\
75managed-keys {\n\
76 # This key (20326) was published in the root zone in 2017.\n\
77 . initial-key 257 3 8 \"AwEAAaz/tAm8yTn4Mfeh5eyI96WSVexTBAvkMgJzkKTOiW1vkIbzxeF3\n\
78 +/4RgWOq7HrxRixHlFlExOLAJr5emLvN7SWXgnLh4+B5xQlNVz8Og8kv\n\
79 ArMtNROxVQuCaSnIDdD5LKyWbRd2n9WGe2R8PzgCmr3EgVLrjyBxWezF\n\
80 0jLHwVN8efS3rCj/EWgvIWgb9tarpVUDK/b58Da+sqqls3eNbuv7pr+e\n\
81 oZG+SrDK6nWeL3c6H5Apxz7LjVc1uTIdsIXxuOLYA4/ilBmSVIzuDWfd\n\
82 RUfhHdY6+cn8HFRm+2hM8AnXGXws9555KrUB5qihylGa8subX2Nn6UwN\n\
83 R1AkUTV74bU=\";\n\
84};\n\
85"
86#endif /* BIND_KEYS_H */
